title: BreakReason
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.

name: BreakReason
type: enum
summary: |
  Reason for the breakpoint hit.
description: |
  Value for the reason the Class.ScriptDebugger.EncounteredBreak signal fired.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Other
    summary: |
      Pausing for a reason not covered by other values, for example if the user
      hit "Pause" button.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Error
    summary: |
      Pausing on error hit in the code.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: SpecialBreakpoint
    summary: |
      Pausing on an internal breakpoint set by debugger command: e.g. step over,
      step into, step out of.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: UserBreakpoint
    summary: |
      Pausing on a user breakpoint.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
